title: Hour 3 - Scott Mitchell (07-20-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Scott Mitchell (07-20-20)
description:
Scott Mitchell tells Dan the Toronto Blue Jays will probably play in Buffalo NY. Scott says that the Blue Jays players have their concerns about playing in minor league park. The players concerns include the club house along with batting cages and proper lighting. Scott tells Dan the the Blue Jays are also looking at Pittsburgh as another option,

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
